Name: Cube Miners
About the game: This is a straightforward yet thrilling sandbox game. It is inspired by Terraria. You can dig gold by yourself or together with the workers hired by you. To protect your workers from enemies, you can buy swords from the store. May 11, 2022: The Arena Update is out, go check it out!
